messages.subject: Re: e-mail from and to client
messages.msgSnippet: ... this ... I m impressed! You beautifully and simply put it right back on her! Joanna
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Dawn" <NumoAstro@a...> wrote:
> Thank you all so much for the input you gave me on my client's e-
> mail. As I'm a coach I decided to digest and think about it for a
> while. Underneath is the e-mail I finally sent to her.
>
> You sound angry and defensive in your e-mail about the choices you
> are making for your child. I'm wondering if you were telling me
this
> for a reason? Did you need some coaching around this subject?
>
> Let me know what you need from me.
>
> Dawn

I'm impressed!
You beautifully and simply put it right back on her!

Joanna

messages.subject: e-mail from and to client
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you all so much for the input you gave me on my client s e- mail.  As I m a coach I decided to digest and think about it for a while.  Underneath is the
messages.messageBody:
Thank you all so much for the input you gave me on my client's e-
mail. As I'm a coach I decided to digest and think about it for a
while. Underneath is the e-mail I finally sent to her.

You sound angry and defensive in your e-mail about the choices you
are making for your child. I'm wondering if you were telling me this
for a reason? Did you need some coaching around this subject?

Let me know what you need from me.

Dawn
